reviews.text: As a person that lives in the neighborhood, the restaurant itself has good food and customer service. But the bar early in the morning allows it's customer or it can be their employees to fight and play loud music with no degree of empathy for the children and babies that live there. They have customers or employees scream and ride mopeds on the sidewalk. It's 5am and they have a car outside the business playing music so loud you can hear it 2 blocks down, if the owner wants evidence we have it.

Atenci√≥n p√©sima, la chica que estaba al entrar parec√≠a molesta por algo, a todo me contestaba de mala forma y me repet√≠a si paga con tarjeta le cuesta m√°s, si come aqu√≠ adentro le cuesta m√°s al final me atendi√≥ otra chica porque ella no quiso y la actitud no era muy distinta a la primera, pens√© que as√≠ eran pero curiosamente a dos hombres de otra mesa los atendieron con mucha cordialidad y luego a otros 4 que llegaron, supongo que tienen sus predilecci√≥n, total cobraron una propina en la factura del 15%  obligatorio aparentemente, pero no la merecen lo siento

I gotta say I've been a fan of Fiesta for 16 years. A Dominican üá©üá¥ restaurant that has lived to what I enjoy. As far as the bake rotisserie chicken and beans, they are on point. The maduros are always fresh. The fried yuca is criispy. Rice is always good, and the dying dreaming drink that we all know as Morir So√±ando is really to die for ü§§. I always tell the people to go here. I'm a 5 star Michelin üë®‚Äçüç≥type of eater. I judge taste and textures. If you wanna dine in, they do have tables. Service is excellent. They give you a nice tiny basket of garlic toasted bread and proceed with the menus. 5 mins later, they ask what you want. With a smile, they bring you your food, or it could just be me smiling as soon as I see my order, I can't remember. Again and again I go. I say it's the only good one around the 10458 area. Take me with you if you decide to go. I'll help youüòÅ but ya paying.

Definitely will not be going back there again.JJ restaurant on east 183 is way better service. I will not spend a dollar more in this restaurant. The servers need to learn better customer service.

Normally, there service is pretty good. But today, around 12:00 p.m, Fiesta Cafe and Bar kind of forced me to rate and review them. Never in my life have I've ever been to any restaurant and had my plate cover and eating  utensils taken away from me and given to somebody else who wasn't even seated yet. Are you kidding me??? Then asked "are you going to take it to go" several times after I stated I'm eating here... both waitresses were older females. The Indian looking Hispanic woman had a horrifying attitude. Couldn't even look me in the face. It was almost as if she was disgusted to provide service. Same goes for the other  female server there. I still tipped out of courtesy and did not receive one thank you. Bad customer services gives you bad reviews. At the end of the day it's about respect and I completely lost it for Fiesta Cafe and Bar. Just totally disgusting and disappointed.

My favorite food in the area for years and years now.  Consistently amazing.  It's always the best when you go for lunch,  but even when you show up after 10pm the food is still SO good. Better than any other Spanish places for miles.
Order anything they have in the steam table. You cant go wrong.
Make sure you get the rice and beans and a delicious salad from the kitchen. Salad comes with corn, beets, watercress, lettuce tomato and cucumber.  So refreshing.
My favorites are the beef stew and goat stew, but the chicken stew, baked chicken and baked pork are equally as good. This place is the BEST.
Late night they have a dj and awesome bar.

This place is so stupid I was ordering food when the lady ask if I was finished I said yes ,so I said I'm going to give you my credit card she said WHAT!!!!!! , I never heard of someone buying food with a credit card. She replied I I said what do you mean you never heard of someone ordering food with a credit card what rock did you crawled out from , that is crazy , so this was last week ,so today I ordered from the same place 45 mins past and I call to see why my order was taking so long she said that there isn't any delivery today , I was like what kind of business is this , so I want to talk to the manager and she said that so manager is present at the time, I said sure there isn't a manager present like really . So I was thinking that imagen if they did took my order what DISCUSTING things they wouldve done with my food , so there you have it nasty service means nasty people.
